name: Downloads Manager: Glass transparency + background
description:
Makes bottom transparent, adds hover effects and background image
Clear list button is wider and hidden when the list is empty

Works on firefox 3.5 and later, Vista/Win7 required

See style 19561 also.
Full transparency makes text more difficult to read (even with text-shadow applied), and does not meets windows user interface guidelines, so I moved to this style.

Update 1: added some padding in bottom

На скриншоте - официальные руководства Microsoft по многопользовательской активации. Никаких провокаций, нужно подготовится к развертыванию Windows 7 =)
